about_the_game:
Do you want to create your dream Garage? With the Garage DLC it's now possible. You can create any garage you want. Any size, any color combination, any budget, with car or motorcycle - it's all up to you

Try all 91 new items and create your dream Garage. Why not make a gaming setup inside garage? Combine DLC furniture with default one to achive best looking room and let your imagination run wild.


Give your room a special touch with new items and turn it into a dream environment.

The Garage DLC contains:

  • 91 new items.
  • Cars and motorcycles.
  • Tools, garage doors, garage shelves, car lifts and more.
